sentinel.led
Class ContextBit

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--sentinel.led.ContextBit
class ContextBit
extends java.lang.Object

The ContextBit class denotes the four bit pattern associated with an event in the event table. The first bit denotes the RECENT context, the second bit denotes CHRONICLE context, the third bit denotes CONTINUOUS context and the fourth bit denotes CUMULATIVE context. This class also contains methods that support various operations on the bit pattern such as setting and resetting particular bits etc.
